trans-unit.source: Contains the parameters defining the flush buffer characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 包含定義排清緩衝區特性的參數。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓管理已部署的 Web 應用程式的生產環境和作業人員。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management> namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management>命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健全狀況事件型別。</xref:System.Web.Management>

trans-unit.source: It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events.
trans-unit.target: 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。

trans-unit.source: The WebEventBufferFlushInfo class defines values that identify the buffer's current status.
trans-unit.target: WebEventBufferFlushInfo 類別定義識別緩衝區的目前狀態的值。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the class is passed as a parameter to the <xref:System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider.ProcessEventFlush%2A> method that processes the messages that have been buffered.
trans-unit.target: 類別的執行個體當做參數傳遞<xref:System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider.ProcessEventFlush%2A>方法，以處理已緩衝處理的訊息。</xref:System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider.ProcessEventFlush%2A>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET health monitoring calls this method when the flushing of the buffer is required.
trans-unit.target: 需要的緩衝區排清時，ASP.NET 健康監視呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This is determined by the parameters defined by the `bufferModes` element in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 這取決於所定義的參數`bufferModes`中的項目`healthMonitoring`組態區段。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > By design, the buffering mechanism might drop some events in order to keep pace with the incoming events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 根據設計，緩衝機制可能會卸除，某些事件以跟上內送事件。

trans-unit.source: It is up to the user to adjust this mechanism by properly modifying the `bufferModes` element in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 會決定使用者調整這項機制，藉由適當地修改`bufferModes`中的項目`healthMonitoring`組態區段。

trans-unit.source: Gets the events collection in the current message.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前訊息中的事件集合。

trans-unit.source: Due to buffering, several events are usually sent in a single message.
trans-unit.target: 因為緩衝區、 多個事件通常會傳送單一訊息中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Management.WebBaseEventCollection"></xref> events contained in the current message.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.Management.WebBaseEventCollection"> </xref>目前訊息中包含的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of events dropped since the last notification.
trans-unit.target: 取得上次告知之後卸除的事件數目。

trans-unit.source: By design, the buffering mechanism might drop some events in order to keep pace with the incoming events.
trans-unit.target: 根據設計，緩衝機制可能會卸除部分事件，以跟上內送事件。

trans-unit.source: It is up to the user to adjust this mechanism by properly modifying the `bufferModes` element in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 會決定使用者調整這項機制，藉由適當地修改`bufferModes`中的項目`healthMonitoring`組態區段。

trans-unit.source: The number of events dropped by the buffering mechanism since the last notification.
trans-unit.target: 自前一次通知緩衝機制來卸除的事件數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of events in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 取得緩衝區中的事件數目。

trans-unit.source: This number is captured at the beginning of the notification.
trans-unit.target: 這個數字會被擷取在通知的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The number of events in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 在緩衝區中的事件數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the date and the time of the last notification.
trans-unit.target: 取得日期和時間的前一次通知。

trans-unit.source: The date and the time of the last notification.
trans-unit.target: 日期和時間的前一次通知。

trans-unit.source: Gets the message sequence in the current notification.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的通知中的訊息序列。

trans-unit.source: The number indicating the message sequence order in the current notification, beginning with an index of zero.
trans-unit.target: 數字，指出目前的通知訊息序列順序開頭為零的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current notification type.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的通知類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.Management.EventNotificationType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.Management.EventNotificationType"></xref>值。
